text: Lino Toffolo (31 December 1934 - 17 May 2016) was an Italian actor, singer, author and television presenter. He was born in Murano, Italy. He was known for his roles in Yuppi du, Brancaleone at the Crusades, and Million Dollar Eel. Toffolo died in Murano, Italy on 17 May 2016, aged 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian singers Category:Italian writers Category:Italian television presenters
title: Lino Toffolo
